name: nonjudicial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not relating to or taking place in a law court: The power to determine disputed elections is undoubtedly a non-judicial function. They provide advice on all non-judicial aspects of court proceedings. nonjudicial settlements pertaining to property trusts
More examplesFewer examplesThe members include both judges and non-judicial representatives.The three soldiers faced nonjudicial punishment for leaving the base without permission.
